name: Tangled Tut - The Adventures of King Tut and Madu
blurb: An exciting platform game where you, King Tut, must use your bandages to get around levels and escape your temple! (physics puzzler)

rewards.reward: SPECIAL THANKS ============================== \r\nEvery little helps. We will send you a Tangled Tut desktop wallpaper as a token of our appreciation for your support to this project. Plus we will add you to our backers list on our website.

TUT ON YOUR MOBILE\r\n==============================  \r\nGet your hands on Tangled Tut for your iOS or Android device + all pledges of \u00a35 or more will grant you access to our backer forums to share ideas. We will also add you to our backers list on our website.

BACKERS ONLY PRICE! TRUE CROSS-PLATFORM GAMER ============================== The full Tangled Tut gameplay combo! Get the game on both your iOS / Android device AND your PC / Linux / Mac. Plus all Previous Rewards!
TUT ON DESKTOP ============================== \r\nGet a virtual copy of Tangled Tut for your Windows, Mac or Linux laptop or desktop computer.

TRUE CROSS-PLATFORM GAMER ============================== \r\nThe full Tangled Tut gameplay combo! Get the game on both your iOS / Android device AND your PC / Linux / Mac.We will also add you to our backers list on our website.

IN-GAME BACKER HAT ============================== \r\nPlay the game with even more style. Your Tut will wear an exclusive in-game hat to show that you are one of our amazing Kickstarter backers + all pledges of \u00a325 or more will give you the game on your device of choice.

THE MERCHANDISE PACK ============================== \r\nGet kitted out with a Tangled Tut Kickstarter exclusive t-shirt, digital download of the game's soundtrack and the official graphics and design pdf booklet.
BADGES AND DOUBLE GAME  ============================== Get three limited edition Tangled Tut's badges / buttons + a virtual copy of the game to give to a friend + Everything in Merchandise Pack!

HOODIE + BADGES + DOUBLE GAME ============================== Get three limited edition Badges plus an extra copy of the game to give to your friend on any device you want, Plus a Hoodie for the cold winter nights. ( Removes t-shirt from previous reward\u2028

EARLY BIRD! - 3D PRINTED TUT USB WITH PHYSICAL COPY OF GAME ============================== 3D Printed figurine finalised with the skilful hands of our team. It will come boxed and sealed, whilst you also enjoy a downloadable copy of the game and BETA Access.

3D PRINTED TUT USB WITH PHYSICAL COPY OF GAME ==============================  3D Printed figurine finalised with the skilful hands of our team. It will come boxed and sealed, whilst you also enjoy a downloadable copy of the game + BETA Access.
IOS ALPHA ACCESS + NAME IN CREDITS ============================== You will be granted ALPHA Access to the game on IOS, this is limited due to Apple Limitations on beta testers. + Tut Physical USB!

DESIGN A LEVEL ============================== Use your creativity to design a new level for the full release with the aid of our level designer! Our designer will assist you to ensure you make it fully playable and fun. Name in the Credits as level designer!

DESIGN A CHARACTER ============================== Help design a non playable character or enemy to join Tut and Madu on Tangled Tut adventures! Help develop the NPC's character and how he will interact with the game. Name In credits as a Character Designer

A HOLIDAY WITH OUR TEAM IN MALTA ============================== Chill in sunny Malta and visit us for 2 days. We will handle the hotel expenses with a sea view room, and take you for a night to Gozo. You will meet our team and help design a Level or a NPC. This includes Tut Physical USB! Plus your name with us on credits screen! You are a Superstar!
